title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4232.4 - No riding or training if suspended
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4232.4 - No riding or training if suspended

State Regulations
A jockey or trainer under suspension in any State or
foreign country shall not be permitted to train or ride in a race for anyone
during the period of his suspension. Any person who shall employ a jockey or
trainer in contravention of this section may be punished as provided by this

Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4232.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
